definition: diaphysis (long segment of a bone)/fig. backbone
to suffer a fracture/(of a bone) to break/fracture
oracle script/oracle bone inscriptions (an early form of Chinese script)
beneath the surface/fundamentally/at the deepest level
lit. carved in bones and engraved in the heart (idiom)/fig. etched in one's memory/unforgettable
to shed one's mortal body and exchange one's bones (idiom); born again Daoist/to turn over a new leaf/fig. to change wholly/to create from other material (story, artwork etc)
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person

sentences.english: Pooling in the pelvic cavity. Which means her heart was stillpumping.
sentences.chinese: 骨盆腔有血液淤积，说明当时她的心脏还在跳动。

sentences.english: The little rain drop slipt from the umbrella to my glasses.
sentences.chinese: 从她伞骨滑下来的小雨点溅在我眼镜玻璃上。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate incision and fixation at different kinds of facial fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估不同类型颌面骨骨折的手术入路及固定方法。

sentences.english: The research progress of osteogenetic effects of OGP is reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章对OGP促成骨作用的研究进展进行综述。

sentences.english: Objective To study the imaging features of Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨静脉畸形骨肥大综合征影像诊断的征象。

sentences.english: These are most frequently seen in the frontal and parietal bones with the orbital and maxillofacial bones infrequently involved.
sentences.chinese: 最常见于额骨和顶骨，眶骨和上颌骨很少受累。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the validity of decompressive hemicraniectomy of massive cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨去骨辨减压术治疗大面积脑梗死的有效性。

sentences.english: The calcaneus projects backward behind the ankle .
sentences.chinese: 跟骨突出于踝部的后方。

sentences.english: Methods The operation consisted of using fibula to block the posterior ankle.
sentences.chinese: 方法取胖骨在踝后作制动的跟骨阻挡术。

sentences.english: PHB is one of the ideal scaffold material in bone tissue engineering.
sentences.chinese: PHB可以作为组织工程材料中的一种来修复骨缺损。

sentences.english: Which increases the degree of mineralization in bone.
sentences.chinese: 增加了骨单位的矿化程度。

sentences.english: Bone of the father, unknowingly given, you will renew your son.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的骨，无意中捐出，可使你的儿子再生。

sentences.english: Southern fried chicken , T-bone steak and Lobster Newburg .
sentences.chinese: 南方炸鸡，T骨牛排，牛堡龙虾。

sentences.english: The cement hardens quickly, creating an internal cast inside of the fractured vertebra.
sentences.chinese: 骨水泥很快变硬，在骨折椎体内部形成内支架。

sentences.english: Conclusion CCHA has good biocompatibility and bone induction.
sentences.chinese: 结论CCHA具有良好的生物相容性和骨诱导作用。

sentences.english: In this paper, the effect of Osteopontin (OPN) gene on the Black Dahe pig reproductive performance was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了骨调素基因对大河乌猪繁殖性能的影响。

definition: muscle/tendon/veins visible under the skin/sth resembling tendons or veins (e.g. fiber in a vegetable)
